title: Husband of BBC presenter killed by the Covid vaccine is suing Astrazeneca , page 6
cleaned_text:
originally posted by: Itisnowagain 

 a reply to: alldaylong 

 

 I know it did not inform you that the pre rollout trials showed a 1 in 800 chance of getting a serious adverse event. 

 

 I don't need to download whatever is on the pdf you linked to know that. 

 

 

 

 Did they inform you on how many die from motor vehicle accidents when you last purchased a car ? 

 

 They should do, as it far more than those who have died from taking a vaccine. 

 

 Life's a risk mate, we run that risk everyday. Did they inform you on how many die from motor vehicle accidents when you last purchased a car ?They should do, as it far more than those who have died from taking a vaccine.Life's a risk mate, we run that risk everyday. 







 

 

 

 

 Since when did they coerce or threaten anyone into buying a car 

 

 

 What do you mean " threaten " ? Do you mean like if you don't have a driving license you can't do certain kinds of work, or if you are banned from driving and loose you driving license you could also loose your job if it invloves driving? 

 

 Do you mean that kind of threaten ? a reply to: Itisnowagain What do you mean " threaten " ? Do you mean like if you don't have a driving license you can't do certain kinds of work, or if you are banned from driving and loose you driving license you could also loose your job if it invloves driving?Do you mean that kind of threaten ? 







 

 You didn't have the available information to consent .......that's the point. 

 

 They had the infomation and did not share it. 

 

 Even now the mantra is 'safe and effective'. 

 

 Do you think that it's simply.....safe and effective? a reply to: alldaylong You didn't have the available information to consent .......that's the point.They had the infomation and did not share it.Even now the mantra is 'safe and effective'.Do you think that it's simply.....safe and effective? 







originally posted by: alldaylong 

 a reply to: Itisnowagain 

 

 

 

 

 Do you think that it's simply.....safe and effective? 

 

 

 Do you think it's always safe to drive a motor vehicle ? 

 

 Life's a risk. Live with it. 

 

 

 

 That's a great philosophy but that's not how it works when it comes to vaccine safety. Perhaps you should try again with better lines and better arguments. That's a great philosophy but that's not how it works when it comes to vaccine safety. Perhaps you should try again with better lines and better arguments. 







originally posted by: alldaylong 

 a reply to: Itisnowagain 

 

 

 

 

 Do you think that it's simply.....safe and effective? 

 

 

 Do you think it's always safe the drive a motor vehicle ? 

 

 Life's a risk. Live with it. 

 

 

 

 I never heard anyone promoting a car by saying it's safe and effective.....let alone coercing me or threatening to take my livelihood away if I refused to buy their safe and effective car......have you? I never heard anyone promoting a car by saying it's safe and effective.....let alone coercing me or threatening to take my livelihood away if I refused to buy their safe and effective car......have you? 







originally posted by: Asmodeus3 

 

originally posted by: alldaylong 

 a reply to: Itisnowagain 

 

 

 

 

 Do you think that it's simply.....safe and effective? 

 

 

 Do you think it's always safe to drive a motor vehicle ? 

 

 Life's a risk. Live with it. 

 

 

 

 That's a great philosophy but that's not how it works when it comes to vaccine safety. Perhaps you should try again with better lines and better arguments. 

 

 

 

 Are some people in The UK under the age of 75 being offered the vaccine this spring ? Yes or No ? 

 

 Come on i am making it easy for you. 

 

 

 edit on 12-4-2023 by alldaylong because: (no reason given)

 Are some people in The UK under the age of 75 being offered the vaccine this spring ? Yes or No ?Come on i am making it easy for you. 







originally posted by: Itisnowagain 

 

originally posted by: alldaylong 

 a reply to: Itisnowagain 

 

 

 

 

 Do you think that it's simply.....safe and effective? 

 

 

 Do you think it's always safe the drive a motor vehicle ? 

 

 Life's a risk. Live with it. 

 

 

 

 I never heard anyone promoting a car by saying it's safe and effective.....let alone coercing me or threatening to take my livelihood away if I refused to buy their safe and effective car......have you? 

 

 Haha well said!! 

 Their arguments are in a turmoil. 

 The member who to have replied to provided a link that doesn't work to argue the AZ vaccine is still offered in the UK. Do you have any news on this?? It has been withdrawn long time ago. Haha well said!!Their arguments are in a turmoil.The member who to have replied to provided a link that doesn't work to argue the AZ vaccine is still offered in the UK. Do you have any news on this?? It has been withdrawn long time ago. 







 

 

 "So you are boasting here that you have helped people because of your great empathy for things they have suffered from, but I can't ever recall seeing you show anyone any empathy for anything EVER here. 

 

 So you lead a double life then?" 

 

 Boasting? 

 

 I was actually pointing out to a poster who constantly accuses me of "defending the pharmaceuticals " that in my real life I have spent some 30 odd years doing the precise opposite. 

 

 Doing stuff in real life is rather more important than posting stuff on an anonymous internet forum. 

 

 "EVER"?!!! 

 

 Please..... 

 

 Quite the echo chamber on here.

 edit on 12-4-2023 by Oldcarpy2 because: (no reason given)

 a reply to: NoCorruptionAllowed "So you are boasting here that you have helped people because of your great empathy for things they have suffered from, but I can't ever recall seeing you show anyone any empathy for anything EVER here.So you lead a double life then?"Boasting?I was actually pointing out to a poster who constantly accuses me of "defending the pharmaceuticals " that in my real life I have spent some 30 odd years doing the precise opposite.Doing stuff in real life is rather more important than posting stuff on an anonymous internet forum."EVER"?!!!Please.....Quite the echo chamber on here.

 Life's a risk. Live with it.

 Are some people in The UK under the age of 75 being offered the vaccine this spring ? Yes or No ? 

 

 Come on i am making it easy for you. 

 

 

 

 Yes the immunosuppressed which I have already discussed a few pages ago. But nobody else will be offered the jabs under the age of 75. You took part of my post out of context and you presented it here. Yes the immunosuppressed which I have already discussed a few pages ago. But nobody else will be offered the jabs under the age of 75. You took part of my post out of context and you presented it here.
